allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Restructure services folder with domain-based organization

- Reorganize services into clear domain subfolders (config, api, input, output, system)
- Move config-related files to config/ (getters, manager, env)
- Move API communication to api/
- Move input processing to input/
- Move output classification to output/
- Move system information to system/
- Add centralized index.js for each domain
- Update all imports across screens, components, and utils
- Fix Welcome.js to import getModel from config instead of system
- Fix Navigation.js to show current directory, branch, and model in footer
- Fix Home.js to use new import paths and update placeholder text
- Fix dotenv loading: move to cli.js entry point to avoid duplicate loading
- Fix InputBox placeholder color from ''gray'' to ''blackBright'' for better readability
- Delete old service files from root directory
- Add config fallback logic documentation in .serena/memories/

This restructure improves code maintainability and makes it easier to understand
the separation of concerns between different service domains.

)")
